AUTHENTICATION_REQUIRED.title: Authentication Required
AUTHENTICATION_REQUIRED.message: You need to sign in to access this resource.

NO_ACCESS.title: Access Denied
NO_ACCESS.message: You don't have permission to access this resource.

FORBIDDEN.title: Forbidden
FORBIDDEN.message: You don't have permission to perform this action.

NOT_FOUND.title: Not Found
NOT_FOUND.message: The requested resource was not found.

FORM_NOT_FOUND.title: Form Not Found
FORM_NOT_FOUND.message: The form you're looking for doesn't exist or has been deleted.

FORM_NOT_PUBLISHED.title: Form Not Available
FORM_NOT_PUBLISHED.message: This form is not currently published and cannot accept responses.

RESPONSE_NOT_FOUND.title: Response Not Found
RESPONSE_NOT_FOUND.message: The response you're looking for doesn't exist.

TEMPLATE_NOT_FOUND.title: Template Not Found
TEMPLATE_NOT_FOUND.message: The template you're looking for doesn't exist.

ORGANIZATION_NOT_FOUND.title: Organization Not Found
ORGANIZATION_NOT_FOUND.message: The organization doesn't exist or you're not a member.

SUBMISSION_LIMIT_EXCEEDED.title: Submission Limit Reached
SUBMISSION_LIMIT_EXCEEDED.message: This form has reached its submission limit for the current subscription plan.

VIEW_LIMIT_EXCEEDED.title: View Limit Reached
VIEW_LIMIT_EXCEEDED.message: This form has reached its view limit for the current subscription plan.

MAX_RESPONSES_REACHED.title: Maximum Responses Reached
MAX_RESPONSES_REACHED.message: This form has reached its maximum number of allowed responses.

FORM_NOT_YET_OPEN.title: Form Not Yet Open
FORM_NOT_YET_OPEN.message: This form is not yet open for submissions. Please check back later.

FORM_CLOSED.title: Form Closed
FORM_CLOSED.message: The submission period for this form has ended.

BAD_USER_INPUT.title: Invalid Input
BAD_USER_INPUT.message: The data you provided is invalid. Please check and try again.

INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR.title: Server Error
INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR.message: Something went wrong on our end. Please try again later.

defaultMessage: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
